author: Sasha Lekach
title: How to 'commute' when you're working from home
description: There's no real need to drive around the block to pretend you're commuting to help maintain a sense of normalcy during the coronavirus outbreak. But if you're still adjusting to suddenly working from home, creating some structure and routine can help make thi…
